name: Pong-kun Ramble
description:
Pong-kun Ramble

Game made for Mini Ludum Dare #58

Theme: Pong

Goal:

Stay alive as long as possible! Jump over nets and throw back the ball with your head. But if the ball hits your body, your ramble is over!

How to play:

SPACE - jump
LEFT, RIGHT, UP - move your head
ESC - quit game
R - restart game (useful if you're stuck because of a glitch)
F - toggle fullscreen mode
